title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.4 - Weights for fillies, mares
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.4 - Weights for fillies, mares

State Regulations

In all races except handicaps and races where the
conditions expressly state to the contrary, the scale of weights is less by the
following: for fillies two years old, three pounds; for mares three years old
and upwards, five pounds before September 1st and three pounds
thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4029.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
